member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Disposes of this instance.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Connection.DoReceivePacketAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Listens for a packet to be received from the network.
member.param: The remote socket from which to receive data.
The socket flags associated with the read operation.
The timespan within which the packet should be received. After this timespan elapses, the receive task is cancelled.
A pre-existing cancellation token that should be observed alongside the timeout.
member.returns: The packet that was received. if not received correctly.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Connection.DoReceivePacketFromAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.EndPoint,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Listens for a packet to be received from the network.
member.param: The socket which will receive the packet.
The remote endpoint from which to receive the packet.
The socket flags associated with the read operation.
The timespan within which the packet should be received. After this timespan elapses, the receive task is cancelled.
A pre-existing cancellation token that should be observed alongside the timeout.
member.returns: The packet that was received and the associated transmission result. if not received correctly.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Connection.DoSendPacketAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,NetSharp.Packets.SerialisedPacket,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends the given packet to the network.
member.param: The remote socket to which to send the packet.
The packet to send.
The socket flags associated with the write operation.
The timespan within which the packet should be received. After this timespan elapses, the send task is cancelled.
A pre-existing cancellation token that should be observed alongside the timeout.
member.returns: Whether the packet was successfully sent.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Connection.DoSendPacketToAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.EndPoint,NetSharp.Packets.SerialisedPacket,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends the given packet to the network.
member.param: The socket which should send the packet.
The remote endpoint to which to send the packet.
The packet to send.
The socket flags associated with the write operation.
The timespan within which the packet should be received. After this timespan elapses, the send task is cancelled.
A pre-existing cancellation token that should be observed alongside the timeout.
member.returns: Whether the packet was successfully sent.

member.name: T:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions
member.summary: Provides additional methods and functionality to the class.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytes(NetSharp.Client,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint. Blocks until the bytes are all sent, and does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytes(NetSharp.Client,System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint. Blocks until the bytes are all sent, whilst observing a timeout of the given length.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytesAsync(NetSharp.Client,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint asynchronously. Does not block, and does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytesWithResponse(NetSharp.Client,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint and waits for the response. Blocks until the bytes are all sent and the response has been received, and does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
member.returns: The byte buffer that was received as a response.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytesWithResponse(NetSharp.Client,System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint and waits for the response. Blocks until the bytes are all sent and the response has been received, whilst observing a timeout of the given length.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt.
member.returns: The byte buffer that was received as a response.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytesWithResponseAsync(NetSharp.Client,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint and waits for the response asynchronously. Does not block, and does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
member.returns: The byte buffer received as a response to the sent buffer.

member.summary: Sends the given request and listens for a response of the given type. Blocks until the response is received. Does not timeout.

The type of response packet to receive.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The request packet to send.
member.returns: The received instance.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendComplex``2(NetSharp.Client,``0,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given request and listens for a response of the given type. Blocks until the response is received. Cancels the operation if the given timeout is exceeded.
member.typeparam: The type of request packet to send.
The type of response packet to receive.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The request packet to send.
The timeout for which to wait for the operation to complete.
member.returns: The received instance.

member.summary: Sends the given request and listens for a response of the given type asynchronously. Does not block. Does not timeout.

The type of response packet to receive.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The request packet to send.
member.returns: The received instance.

member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendSimple``1(NetSharp.Client,``0,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given request without listening for a response, blocking until it is sent. Cancels the operation if the given timeout is exceeded.
member.typeparam: The type of request packet to send.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The request packet to send.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryBind(NetSharp.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Attempts to synchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Blocks. Does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The local IP address to bind to. Null if any IP address will suffice.
The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryBind(NetSharp.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to synchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Blocks. If the timeout is exceeded the binding attempt is aborted and the method returns false.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The local IP address to bind to. Null if any IP address will suffice.
The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
The timeout within which to attempt the binding.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryBindAsync(NetSharp.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Attempts to asynchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Does not block. Does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The local IP address to bind to. Null if any IP address will suffice.
The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryConnect(NetSharp.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to connect to the remote at the given and over the given port. Does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The remote IP address to connect to.
The remote port to connect over.
member.returns: Whether the connection was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryConnect(NetSharp.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to connect to the remote at the given and over the given port. If the timeout is exceeded the connection attempt is aborted and the method returns false.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The remote IP address to connect to.
The remote port to connect over.
The timeout within which to attempt the connection.
member.returns: Whether the connection was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryConnectAsync(NetSharp.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to connect asynchronously to the remote at the given and over the given port. Does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The remote IP address to connect to.
The remote port to connect over.
member.returns: Whether the connection was successful or not.

member.name: T:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient
member.summary: Describes a client capable of asynchronous communication with an connection.

member.name: E:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.Connected
member.summary: Signifies that a connection with the remote endpoint has been made.

member.name: E:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Signifies that the connection with the remote endpoint was severed.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.SendBytesAsync(System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint asynchronously. Does not block, and observes a timeout of the given length. timeout.
member.param: The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt.
member.returns: Whether the transmission attempt was successful.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.SendBytesWithResponseAsync(System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint and waits for the response asynchronously. Does not block, and observes a timeout of the given length. timeout.
member.param: The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.

The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt. This timeout is reused by both the 'send' and 'receive' parts of the transmission attempt, such that the maximum timeout is equal to 2 times the given value.
member.returns: The byte buffer received as a response to the sent buffer.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.SendComplexAsync``2(``0,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given request and listens for a response of the given type asynchronously. Does not block. Cancels the operation if the given timeout is exceeded
member.typeparam: The type of request packet to send.
The type of response packet to receive.
member.param: The request packet to send.
The timeout for which to wait for the operation to complete.
member.returns: The received instance.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.SendSimpleAsync``1(``0,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given request asynchronously without listening for a response, not blocking until it is sent. Cancels the operation if the given timeout is exceeded.
member.typeparam: The type of request packet to send.
member.param: The request packet to send.
The timeout for which to wait for the operation to complete.
member.returns: Whether the transmission attempt was successful.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.TryBindAsync(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to asynchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Does not block. If the timeout is exceeded the binding attempt is aborted and the method returns false.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to. Null if any IP address will suffice.
The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
The timeout within which to attempt the binding.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Interfaces.IClient.TryConnectAsync(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to connect asynchronously to the remote at the given and over the given port. If the timeout is exceeded the connection attempt is aborted and the method returns false.
member.param: The remote IP address to connect to.
The remote port to connect over.
The timeout within which to attempt the connection.
member.returns: Whether the connection was successful or not.

member.typeparam: The type of request packet for which to deregister the handler delegate.
The type of response packet that is generated by the delegate method.
member.param: The old handler delegate method that was previously registered.

The type of response packet that is generated by the delegate method.

member.returns: Whether the packet handler delegate was successfully registered.

member.param: The local endpoint to bind to.
The timeout within which to attempt the binding.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

members.member:
Helper class for asynchronously performing common network operations, for both the UDP and TCP protocols.
TODO: Implement cancellation support for network operations TODO: Somehow dont run into the exception below [Excep] Socket exception while reading bytes from 0.0.0.0:0: System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10040): Komunikat wysany na gniazdo datagramu by wikszy ni wewntrzny bufor lub przekracza inny sieciowy limit albo bufor uywany do odbierania datagramw by mniejszy ni sam datagram. at NetSharp.Extensions.SocketTask.GetResult() in G:\Git Repos\EnderRifter\NetSharp\NetSharp\NetSharp\Extensions\SocketExtensions.cs:line 158 at NetSharp.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadFromAsync(Socket socket, Int32 count, EndPoint remoteEndPoint, SocketFlags socketFlags) in G:\Git Repos\EnderRifter\NetSharp\NetSharp\NetSharp\Utils\NetworkOperations.cs:line 78 at NetSharp.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadPacketFromAsync(Socket socket, EndPoint remoteEndPoint, SocketFlags socketFlags, CancellationToken cancellationToken) in G:\Git Repos\EnderRifter\NetSharp\NetSharp\NetSharp\Utils\NetworkOperations.cs:line 225 at NetSharp.Connection.DoReceivePacketFromAsync(Socket socket, EndPoint remoteEndPoint, SocketFlags socketFlags, TimeSpan timeout, CancellationToken cancellationToken) in G:\Git Repos\EnderRifter\NetSharp\NetSharp\NetSharp\Connection.cs:line 114

member.name: M:NetSharp.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads the specified amount of data from the network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read.
member.param: The socket which should read data from the network.
The number of bytes to read from the network.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
member.returns: The result of the receive operation.

member.summary: Reads a datagram segment of the given length from the given remote endpoint, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read.
member.param: The socket which should read data from the network.
The number of bytes to read from the network.
The remote endpoint from which data should be read.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
member.returns: The result of the receive operation.

member.summary: Writes the given data buffer to the network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the write, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.

The buffer that should be written to the network.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.

member.param: The socket which should write data to the network.

The socket flags associated with the send operation.

member.summary: Reads a packet from network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read.
member.param: The socket which should read the packet from the network.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
The cancellation token that should be observed for the duration of the task.
member.returns: The read packet, and the endpoint from which it was read.

The cancellation token that should be observed for the duration of the task.
